TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DataControlField extends System.Object implements class System.Web.UI.IDataSourceViewSchemaAccessor, class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public MustInherit Class DataControlField Implements IDataSourceViewSchemaAccessor, IStateManager
public ref class DataControlField abstract : System::Web::UI::IDataSourceViewSchemaAccessor, System::Web::UI::IStateManager

summary.span: 作為所有資料控制項欄位類型的基底類別，代表表格式資料繫結控制項中資料的資料行，例如 和 。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all data control field types, which represent a column of data in tabular data-bound controls such as and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別作為基底類別的所有資料控制項欄位類型。The class serves as the base class for all data control field types. 資料繫結控制項所使用的資料控制項欄位來表示欄位的資料，類似物件都代表一種資料行中控制項。Data control fields are used by data-bound controls to represent a field of data, similar to how a object represents a type of column in the control. 使用衍生自類別來控制資料欄位中顯示的方式在資料繫結控制項例如或。Use the classes that are derived from to control how a field of data is displayed in a data-bound control such as or . 下表列出 ASP.NET 所提供的不同資料控制項欄位類型。The following table lists the different data control field types provided by ASP.NET. |資料行欄位類型Column field type|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| ||以文字中顯示資料來源中欄位的值。Displays the value of a field in a data source as text.| ||資料繫結控制項中顯示命令按鈕。Displays a command button in a data-bound control. 依據控制項，這可讓您顯示一個資料列或資料行與自訂按鈕控制項，例如新增或移除 按鈕。Depending on the control, this allows you to display either a row or a column with a custom button control, such as an Add or a Remove button.| ||資料繫結控制項中顯示核取方塊。Displays a check box in a data-bound control. 此資料控制項欄位類型通常用於顯示具有布林值的欄位。This data control field type is commonly used to display fields with a Boolean value.| ||顯示內建命令按鈕來執行編輯、 插入或刪除的資料繫結控制項中的作業。Displays built-in command buttons to perform edit, insert, or delete operations in a data-bound control.| ||資料來源中的欄位的值顯示為超連結。Displays the value of a field in a data source as a hyperlink. 此資料控制項欄位類型可讓您將第二個欄位繫結至超連結的 URL。This data control field type allows you to bind a second field to the hyperlink's URL.| ||資料繫結控制項中顯示的影像。Displays an image in a data-bound control.| ||顯示使用者定義的內容會根據指定的範本資料繫結控制項。Displays user-defined content in a data-bound control according to a specified template.| 您也可以擴充和類別來建立您自己的資料控制項欄位類型。You can also extend the and classes to create your own data control field types. 類別會提供許多屬性，以決定使用者介面 (UI) 項目中的資料繫結控制項的呈現方式。The class provides many properties that determine how user interface (UI) elements are presented in the data-bound control. 並非每個控制項呈現 UI 時，會使用每個可用的資料控制項欄位屬性。Not every control uses every available data control field property when rendering a UI. 例如，控制項，為資料列中顯示的資料控制項欄位，包含的標頭項目，每個資料控制項欄位，但沒有頁尾項目。For example, the control, which displays the data control fields as rows, includes a header item for each data control field, but no footer item. 因此，和屬性會忽略控制項。Therefore, the and properties are ignored by the control. 控制項，不過，使用和屬性如果屬性設定為`true`。The control, however, uses the and properties if the property is set to `true`. 同樣地，資料控制項欄位屬性會影響呈現的項目而定的 UI 項目。Similarly, the data control field properties affect the presentation of UI elements depending on what the element is. 屬性一律會套用至欄位。The property is always applied to the field. 如果型別衍生自中包含的控制項，或類別，屬性套用至欄位。If the type derived from contains a control, as in the or classes, the property is applied to the field. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用和物件，衍生自，以顯示中的資料列控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use and objects, which are derived from , to display rows in a control. 控制項有屬性設定為`false`，讓它顯示所傳回的資料子集屬性。The control has the property set to `false`, which enables it to display a subset of the data returned by the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_1/CS/datacontrolfield1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_1/VB/datacontrolfield1vb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充類別以建立可用於自訂繫結的欄位控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to extend the class to create a custom bound field that can be used in a control. 類似於類別`RadioButtonField`類別代表的資料行`true`或`false`資料。Similar to the class, the `RadioButtonField` class represents a column of `true` or `false` data. 不過，雖然資料的類別繫結至可以是任何一組`true`或`false`值的資料集，`RadioButtonField`類別繫結至只能有一個`true`在任何指定時間的值。However, although the data that the class is bound to can be any set of `true` or `false` values, the set of data that the `RadioButtonField` class is bound to can have only one `true` value at any given time. 這個範例示範如何實作和方法、 兩個重要類別方法的所有衍生自。This example demonstrates how to implement the and methods, two important methods of all classes derived from . [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField/CS/radiobuttonfield.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField/VB/radiobuttonfield.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用`RadioButtonField`類別，提供在上述範例中中,控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the `RadioButtonField` class, which is provided in the previous example, in a control. 在此範例中，控制項會顯示球隊的資料。In this example, the control displays data for a sports team. 播放程式資料是在資料表，其中包含識別碼資料行、 資料行的播放程式名稱，以及一個 true 或 false 的資料行可識別小組隊長維護。The player data is maintained in a data table that includes an ID column, columns for the player names, and a true or false column that identifies the captain of the team. `RadioButtonField`類別用來顯示哪一個小組成員目前隊長。The `RadioButtonField` class is used to display which team member is the current team captain. 可以編輯控制項，來選擇新隊長或變更播放程式的其他資訊。The control can be edited to choose a new team captain or to change other player information. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_4/CS/datacontrolfield4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_4/VB/datacontrolfield4vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為類別是抽象的您無法建立直接物件。Because the class is abstract, you cannot create a object directly. 這個建構函式來初始化中定義的屬性在衍生類別的建構函式通常稱為類別。This constructor is commonly called by the constructor of a derived class to initialize the properties defined in the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法來引發狀態變更事件時屬性設定。The method is called to raise a state change event when the property is set. 值屬性儲存在檢視狀態。The value of the property is stored in view state. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

summary.span: 取得 物件內含之任何 Web 伺服器控制項的樣式。

span.span: Gets the style of any Web server controls contained by the object.

value.span: ，管理欄位包含之 Web 伺服器控制項的外觀。

span.span: A that governs the appearance of Web server controls contained by the field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可控制所衍生自型別包含任何 Web 伺服器控制項的外觀。The property governs the appearance of any Web server controls contained by types derived from . 這個屬性不會影響所有衍生型別。This property does not affect all derived types. 控制項通常會顯示文字資料，並且僅包含控制，只會受到屬性在狀態。The control, which typically displays text data and contains only controls, is only affected by the property when in state. Web 伺服器控制項，例如和可能受到屬性，根據特定組態的欄位所包含的控制項物件執行個體。Web server controls such as and might be affected by the property, depending on the specific configuration of the control object instances contained by the field. 例如，控制項可以呈現為， ，或物件。For example, the control can be rendered as a , , or object. 雖然控制受到`font`屬性指定的物件控制項不是。Although a control is affected by `font` attributes of the specified object, a control is not. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用和物件，衍生自，以顯示中的資料列控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use and objects, which are derived from , to display rows in a control. 屬性物件設定，可控制如何顯示欄位所包含的控制項。The property of the object is set and governs how the control contained by the field is displayed. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_2/CS/datacontrolfield2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_2/VB/datacontrolfield2vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 從目前資料表儲存格中擷取資料控制項欄位的值，並將值加入至指定的 集合。

span.span: Extracts the value of the data control field from the current table cell and adds the value to the specified collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法藉由衍生自型別使目前的欄位與值，如果適用的話。The method is implemented by types derived from to associate the current field with a value, if applicable. 欄位/值組會儲存在`dictionary`傳遞給方法的集合。The field/value pair is stored in the `dictionary` collection that is passed to the method. 方法透過呼叫`ExtractRowValues`方法的資料控制項，例如和。The method is called by the `ExtractRowValues` method of data controls such as and . 呼叫這個方法，當您撰寫自訂資料繫結控制項所使用的來組合一組資料格和其關聯的值的物件。Call this method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses objects to assemble a set of cells and their associated values. 實作這個方法，當您撰寫類別，衍生自會顯示使用者資料繫結的資料。Implement this method when you are writing a class derived from that displays user data or data-bound data. 所有衍生型別實作方法，因為並非所有的欄位會顯示使用者資料。Not all derived types implement the method, because not all fields display user data. 例如，控制項顯示的按鈕，並沒有任何使用者資料。For example, the control displays a button and has no user data. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作方法的控制項，衍生自類別。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method for a control that derives from the class. `RadioButtonField`類別會轉譯每個資料列的資料繫結選項按鈕控制項。The `RadioButtonField` class renders a data-bound radio button for every row in a control. 當方法呼叫，該方法會嘗試判斷是否的目前值資料格中所包含的物件已選取或清除，並將值加入集合。When the method is called, the method attempts to determine whether the current value of the object contained in the cell is selected or cleared, and adds the value to the collection. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField/CS/radiobuttonfield.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField/VB/radiobuttonfield.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得或設定資料控制項欄位的頁尾樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style of the footer of the data control field.

value.span: ，管理 之頁尾項目的外觀。

span.span: A that governs the appearance of the footer item of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性控制的任何衍生自類型頁尾項目中所顯示的文字外觀。The property governs the appearance of any text displayed in the footer item of a type derived from . > [!NOTE] > 某些資料繫結控制項並不會轉譯的頁尾項目資料控制項欄位。Some data-bound controls do not render a footer item for a data control field. 例如，控制項顯示成資料列的資料控制項欄位。For example, the control displays its data control fields as rows. 頁尾的項目不會呈現這些資料控制項欄位。A footer item is not rendered for these data control fields. 會忽略這些控制項中的屬性。The property is ignored in these controls.

value.span: 字串，顯示在 的頁尾項目中。

span.span: A string that is displayed in the footer item of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用與欄位有關的屬性，以將附註或意見加入至資料控制項欄位，或其他資料。Use the property to add notes or comments to a data control field, or for other data related to the field. > [!NOTE] > 某些資料繫結控制項並不會轉譯的頁尾項目資料控制項欄位。Some data-bound controls do not render a footer item for a data control field. 例如，控制項顯示成資料列的資料控制項欄位。For example, the control displays its data control fields as rows. 頁尾的項目不會呈現這些資料控制項欄位。A footer item is not rendered for these data control fields. 會忽略這些控制項中的屬性。The property is ignored in these controls. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

value.span: 字串，表示顯示在 的標頭項目中之影像的完整或相對 URL。

span.span: A string that represents a fully qualified or relative URL to an image that is displayed in the header item of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定時要顯示的資料控制項，而非標頭文字標頭項目中之影像的屬性。Set the property when you want an image displayed in the header item of a data control instead of header text. > [!NOTE] > 如果兩個和設定的屬性，屬性擁有優先權。If both the and properties are set, the property has precedence. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式設定屬性資料行，顯示中的映像控制項的資料行標頭，而非標頭文字。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the property of a column, which displays an image in the control's column header instead of header text. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_3/CS/datacontrolfield3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_3/VB/datacontrolfield3vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定資料控制項欄位的標頭樣式。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性控制的任何衍生自類型標頭項目中所顯示的文字外觀。The property governs the appearance of any text displayed in the header item of a type derived from . 最常見的應用程式的屬性是改變資料行中的標頭的樣式控制項。The most common application of the property is to alter the style of the column headers in a control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式設定屬性資料行，顯示資料行標頭中的黃色背景色彩控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the property of a column, which displays a yellow background color for the column header in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_3/CS/datacontrolfield3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_3/VB/datacontrolfield3vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定顯示在資料控制項欄位之標頭項目中的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is displayed in the header item of a data control field.

value.span: 字串，顯示在 的標頭項目中。

span.span: A string that is displayed in the header item of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來識別資料控制項中的欄位易記名稱。Use the property to identify a field in a data control with a friendly name. 最常見的應用程式的屬性是要提供有意義的資料行名稱中的資料繫結欄位或控制項。The most common application of the property is to provide meaningful column names for data-bound fields in a or control. > [!NOTE] > 如果兩個和設定的屬性，屬性擁有優先權。If both the and properties are set, the property has precedence. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式設定屬性資料行中的資料行標頭文字顯示控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the properties of columns to display text in the column headers of a control. 這個程式碼範例示範的主版詳細資料案例控制項用來顯示資料，同時子集控制項用來顯示一組較大的資料，並插入新的記錄。This code example demonstrates a master-details scenario in which a control is used to display a subset of data while the control is used to display a larger set of data and insert new records. 此範例會使用兩個控制項： 一個用來填入控制項和一個用來填入控制及插入資料。The example uses two controls: one to populate the control and one to populate the control and insert data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/CS/sql15cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_15sql/VB/sql15vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 執行資料控制項欄位的基本執行個體初始化。

span.span: Performs basic instance initialization for a data control field.
Always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項的物件都與呼叫方法來初始化欄位才能加入至資料列集合。The control that the object is associated with calls the method to initialize the field before it is added to a rows collection. 資料控制項，例如和呼叫方法在其`CreateChildControls`方法之前呼叫其他方法，例如`CreateRow`建立特定的資料列與資料。Data controls such as and call the method in their `CreateChildControls` methods before calling other methods such as `CreateRow` to create specific rows with data. 呼叫這個方法，當您撰寫自訂資料繫結控制項所使用的物件來執行基本的初始化任何物件。Call this method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses objects to perform basic initialization for any objects. 實作這個方法，如果您的衍生型別需要的任何物件初始設定之前它所擴展,物件與資料或控制項中方法。Implement this method if your derived type requires any object initialization before it populates objects with data or controls in the method.

summary.span: 將文字或控制項加入至儲存格的控制項集合。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 型別衍生自實作方法，將文字和控制項加入資料控制項用來顯示使用者介面 (UI) 的資料表所屬的物件。Types derived from implement the method to add text and controls to a object that belongs to a data control that uses tables to display a user interface (UI). 這些資料控制項建立完整的資料表結構列當其各自`CreateChildControls`呼叫的方法。These data controls create the complete table structure row by row when their respective `CreateChildControls` methods are called. 方法透過呼叫`InitializeRow`方法的資料控制項，例如和。The method is called by the `InitializeRow` method of data controls such as and . 呼叫這個方法，當您撰寫自訂資料繫結控制項所使用的物件初始化的資料格的資料或控制項的資料表結構。Call this method when you are writing a custom data-bound control that uses objects to initialize the cells of the table structure with data or controls. 實作這個方法，當您撰寫類別，衍生自。Implement this method when you are writing a class derived from . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作方法的控制項，衍生自類別。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method for a control that derives from the class. `RadioButtonField`類別會轉譯每個資料列的資料繫結選項按鈕控制項。The `RadioButtonField` class renders a data-bound radio button for every row in a control. 當列會顯示給使用者的資料，而不是處於編輯模式，控制項已停用。When the row is displaying data to a user and is not in edit mode, the control is disabled. 在資料列處於編輯模式，例如，當使用者選擇要更新中的資料列控制項，為已啟用，以便可以按一下要呈現控制項。When the row is in edit mode, for example when the user chooses to update a row in the control, the control is rendered as enabled so that it can be clicked. 這個範例會使用位元 AND 運算子，因為資料列狀態的可能組合的一個或多個值。This example uses bitwise AND operators, because the row state might be a combination of one or more values. [!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField/CS/radiobuttonfield.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField/VB/radiobuttonfield.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可控制的任何文字所顯示的資料型別衍生自外觀。The property governs the appearance of any text data displayed by a type derived from . 例如，當您繫結控制項文字資料，您可以使用屬性來變更顯示的文字的外觀。For example, when you bind a control to text data, you can use the property to alter the appearance of the text that is displayed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式設定屬性物件用來顯示`FirstName`和`LastName`中的資料控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the property on the objects used to display `FirstName` and `LastName` data in a control. 控制項有屬性設定為`false`，讓它顯示所傳回的資料子集屬性。The control has the property set to `false`, which enables it to display a subset of the data returned by the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_1/CS/datacontrolfield1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_1/VB/datacontrolfield1vb.aspx#1)]

param.name: savedState

span.span: An object that represents the state to restore.

summary.span: 將資料來源檢視還原成之前所儲存的檢視狀態。

span.span: Restores the data source view's previously saved view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定自訂的伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce). 這個方法會還原檢視狀態資訊物件所儲存的先前頁面要求從方法。This method restores view-state information for the object from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void OnFieldChanged ();
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnFieldChanged() cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnFieldChanged ()
protected: virtual void OnFieldChanged();

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法就會引發事件的信號物件的狀態已變更。The method raises an event signaling that the object's state has changed. 下列屬性的變更會導致引發此事件： ， ， ， ， ，和。Changes to the following properties cause this event to be raised: , , , , , and . 衍生型別屬性也會引發此事件發生狀態變更時。Derived type properties also raise this event when state changes occur. 例如，web 伺服器控制項和通常會呼叫`DataBind`方法以回應欄位變更事件。Web server controls such as and typically call the `DataBind` method in response to a field change event. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual object SaveViewState ();
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance object SaveViewState() cil managed
Protected Overridable Function SaveViewState () As Object
protected: virtual System::Object ^ SaveViewState();

summary.span: 儲存自頁面回傳至伺服器以來對 檢視狀態所做的變更。

span.span: Saves the changes made to the view state since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含 檢視狀態變更的物件。

span.span: The object that contains the changes to the view state.

returns.span: 如果沒有與物件關聯的檢視狀態，則這個方法會傳回 。

span.span: If there is no view state associated with the object, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。This method is used primarily by control developers. 檢視狀態是伺服器控制項的屬性值的累積。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 這些值會自動放入伺服器控制項的屬性，這是執行個體的類別。These values are automatically placed in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 儲存狀態的伺服器控制項的生命週期的階段之後，這個屬性的值然後會保存到字串物件。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle. 儲存檢視狀態時，字串會傳回到用戶端為儲存在 HTML 中的變數`hidden`項目。When view state is saved, a string is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an HTML `hidden` element. 當您撰寫自訂的伺服器控制項時，您可以透過覆寫這個方法，並修改您的伺服器控制項來改善效率屬性。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 檢視狀態概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/19d2a6ed-9a77-4c7c-a7f5-74dd4b6c3818)。For more information, see [ASP.NET View State Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/19d2a6ed-9a77-4c7c-a7f5-74dd4b6c3818).

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，表示欄位所包含的控制項支援回呼 (Callback)。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, signals that the controls contained by a field support callbacks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法，用來判斷控制項是否包含在支援回呼的物件。The method is a helper method used to determine whether the controls contained in a object support callbacks. 已經實作這個方法的基底實作，以擲回例外狀況指出不支援回呼。The base implementation of this method has been implemented to throw a exception to indicate that callbacks are not supported. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。This method is used primarily by control developers.

exception.span: 會在 類別的預設執行個體上呼叫這個方法。

span.span: The method is called on a default instance of the class.

para.span: 類別衍生自類別可以覆寫此方法，指出是否根據欄位支援回呼所包含的控制項。

span.span: Classes that derive from the class can override this method to indicate whether the controls contained by the field support callbacks.

para.span: 若要指出支援回呼，實作這個方法作為空方法不會擲回例外狀況。有用的訊息，說明為什麼不支援回呼，否則擲回例外狀況。

span.span: To indicate that callbacks are supported, implement this method as an empty method that does not throw an exception; otherwise, throw an exception with a useful message describing why callbacks are not supported.

MemberSignature.Value: protected System.Web.UI.StateBag ViewState { get; }
.property instance class System.Web.UI.StateBag ViewState
Protected ReadOnly Property ViewState As StateBag
protected: property System::Web::UI::StateBag ^ ViewState { System::Web::UI::StateBag ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得狀態資訊的字典，允許您在相同頁面的多個要求之間，儲存和還原 物件的檢視狀態。

span.span: Gets a dictionary of state information that allows you to save and restore the view state of a object across multiple requests for the same page.

value.span: 的執行個體，包含 檢視狀態資訊。

span.span: An instance of that contains the view-state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料控制項欄位的檢視狀態是累積的所有屬性值。A data control field's view state is the accumulation of all its property values. 若要保留這些值在 HTTP 要求，ASP.NET 伺服器控制項使用這個屬性，也就是執行個體的類別，以儲存屬性值。To preserve these values across HTTP requests, ASP.NET server controls use this property, which is an instance of the class, to store the property values. 值會接著為變數時傳遞至 HTML 隱藏 input 元素，處理後續的要求。The values are then passed as a variable to an HTML hidden input element when subsequent requests are processed. 如需儲存伺服器控制項檢視狀態的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 檢視狀態概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/19d2a6ed-9a77-4c7c-a7f5-74dd4b6c3818)。For more information about saving server control view state, see [ASP.NET View State Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/19d2a6ed-9a77-4c7c-a7f5-74dd4b6c3818). 檢視狀態所有的伺服器控制項的預設啟用，但有情況下您會想要停用它。View state is enabled for all server controls by default, but there are circumstances when you will want to disable it. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 效能概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f882bf1b-a009-4312-ac06-74370ffabc0b)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Performance Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f882bf1b-a009-4312-ac06-74370ffabc0b). 如需字典和使用方式的詳細資訊，請參閱[集合和資料結構](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/60cc581f-1db5-445b-ba04-a173396bf872)。For more information about dictionaries and how to use them, see [Collections and Data Structures](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/60cc581f-1db5-445b-ba04-a173396bf872).

MemberSignature.Value: public bool Visible { get; set; }

public: property bool Visible { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指示是否呈現資料控制項欄位。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a data control field is rendered.

span.span: if the is rendered; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可顯示或隱藏資料繫結控制項中的物件。Use the property to show or hide objects in a data-bound control. 如果屬性是`false`，資料值不會顯示，並且不要讓來回作業給用戶端。If the property is `false`, the data values are not displayed and do not make a round-trip to the client. 如果您想要反覆存取資料的欄位，看不到，加入欄位名稱`DataKeyNames`資料繫結控制項的屬性。If you want to round-trip the data for a field that is not visible, add the field name to the `DataKeyNames` property of the data-bound control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用和物件，衍生自，以顯示中的資料列控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use and objects, which are derived from , to display rows in a control. 屬性顯示物件`EmployeeID`資料行設為`false`，和資料行不會轉譯根據控制項。The property of the object that displays the `EmployeeID` column is set to `false`, and the column is not rendered by the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_2/CS/datacontrolfield2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField_2/VB/datacontrolfield2vb.aspx#1)]
